tips.firstTimePrompt: As you haven't released a version yet, an initial release is needed.
tips.invalidVersionField: Version field in package.json is missing or invalid
tips.enterInitialVersion: Please enter your initial version number, default is 0.0.1:
tips.error: Please enter a valid semantic version number, for example: v{0}

main.prompt: What would you like to do

upgrade.prompt: Which version would you like to upgrade
upgrade.confirmPush: Do you want to push the version to the repository

specificVersion.confirm: Your current version is: v{0}, confirm to specify version: v{1}

revoke.prompt: Which version would you like to revoke

revokeCurrentVersion.prompt: Retain changes to files, only revoke version number

revokeSpecificVersion.prompt: Please enter the version number to revoke:
revokeSpecificVersion.retainChanges: Retain changes to files, only revoke version number
revokeSpecificVersion.confirm: Your current version is: v{0}, confirm to revoke: v{1}

revertToPreviousVersion.updatePackageJson: Do you want to update the version number in package.json: v{0} to the revoked version v{1}
revertToPreviousVersion.failedToRetrieve: Failed to retrieve version number from previous commit, temporarily no changes to version number in package.json. Please modify manually if necessary.
